original_text: And after Ahithophel was Jehoiada the son of Benaiah, and Abiathar: and the general of the king's army was Joab.
korean_text: 브나야의 아들 여호야다와 아비아달은 아히도벨의 뒤를 이었고 요압은 왕의 군대 지휘관이 되었더라

sentences.original_text: And after Ahithophel was Jehoiada son of Benaiah
and the general of the king's army was Joab
